::Zardus::

Zardus looks after the shuttle as it dissapears into the horizon. He 
turns around, the doors of the docking bay closing. Zardus hoped that 
Gotron would be successful.

He exits the docking bay, heading toward the bridge.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Gotron: Okay, Zardus, I won't fail you...I hope.
> 
> Gotron climbs into one of the vehicles, a one man shuttle, he 
thought it
> would be fast.
> 
> Gotron: I'll leave right away.
> 
> So Gotron leaves in the vehicle and goes towards the Cybertronian 
Fire...
